member.name: M:TestTask.Controllers.MapDataController.LakeArea
member.summary: Builds the map object from input file, finds the area of lakes(water squares that have an adjacent water square) and returns the area of lakes.

member.name: M:TestTask.Controllers.MapDataController.WaterArea
member.summary: Builds the map object from input file, finds the area of waters and returns the area of waters.

member.name: M:TestTask.Controllers.MapDataController.Map
member.summary: Builds the map object from input file and returns it.

member.name: M:TestTask.Controllers.MapDataController.LoadMapData(System.String)
member.summary: Takes the map data as input and returns the Map object JSON.

member.name: M:TestTask.Controllers.MapDataController.LoadLakeData(System.String)
member.summary: Takes the map data as input and returns the Lake(water squares that have an adjacent water square) area.

member.name: M:TestTask.Controllers.MapDataController.LoadWaterData(System.String)
member.summary: Takes the map data as input and returns the Lake(water squares that have an adjacent water square) area.
